business_insights.insight: Average transaction value is $354.26 with high variability (std: $337.26)
business_insights.recommendation: Focus on increasing transaction consistency and targeting high-value customers

business_insights.insight: Electronics is the most popular product category
business_insights.recommendation: Invest in expanding Electronics product lines and inventory

business_insights.insight: High-value customers represent 34.0% of customer base but drive significant revenue
business_insights.recommendation: Implement VIP loyalty programs to retain high-value customers

time_insights.recommendation: Implement strategies to stabilize daily sales through promotions and inventory management

time_insights.insight: Monday is the best performing day of the week
time_insights.recommendation: Schedule major promotions and new product launches on Mondays

time_insights.insight: Winter shows the highest sales performance
time_insights.recommendation: Increase inventory and marketing budget during Winter season

cp_insights.recommendation: Focus on retaining and expanding high-value customer relationships
